links: G. Kuperberg, Symmetry classes of alternating-sign matrices under one roof, arXiv math.CO/0008184 [Th. 5]
formula: (3^(n*(n-1)/2)*A005130(n).a(n+1) is the Hankel transform of A097188. Odd terms occur in a(n+1) at positions given by 2*A000975(n). - _Paul Barry_, Feb 09 2007
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Feb 04 2001
